com.here.android.mpa.common

Interface OffScreenRenderer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MapOffScreenRenderer, StreetLevelOffScreenCapture

    public interface OffScreenRenderer
    Base interface for an offscreen renderer. This interface is useful for drawing a Map image without an actual View.
    See Also:
    MapOffScreenRenderer

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  OffScreenRenderer.SurfaceUpdatedListener
      Listener interface to be notified when the surface has been re-drawn and comitted.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void getScreenCapture(OnScreenCaptureListener listener)
      Returns the full screen bitmap for the Map.
      OffScreenRenderer setSize(int width, int height)
      Set the size of the requested screen surface
      void start()
      Start the offscreen renderer.
      void start(android.view.SurfaceHolder renderTarget, OffScreenRenderer.SurfaceUpdatedListener listener)
      Start the offscreen renderer.
      void stop()
      Stop the offscreen renderer.

    • Method Detail

      • start

        void start()
        Start the offscreen renderer. A new PBuffer based surface will be allocated.
        Before calling this method, OffScreenRenderer.setSize(int, int) must have been called with valid values.

      • start

        void start(android.view.SurfaceHolder renderTarget,
         OffScreenRenderer.SurfaceUpdatedListener listener)
        Start the offscreen renderer. The renderer will be attached to the supplied SurfaceHolder argument.
        Parameters:
        renderTarget - Surface to attach to.
        listener - Callback when the surface has been updated

      • stop

        void stop()
        Stop the offscreen renderer. All resource allocated will be released.

      • setSize

        OffScreenRenderer setSize(int width,
                        int height)
        Set the size of the requested screen surface
        Parameters:
        width - The screen surface width, in number of pixels
        height - The screen surface height, in number of pixels
        Returns:
        This OffScreenRenderer

      • getScreenCapture

        void getScreenCapture(OnScreenCaptureListener listener)
        Returns the full screen bitmap for the Map. This method is asynchronous and will invoke a callback once the operation is completed through the OnScreenCaptureListener. The OffScreenRenderer must be running to create the screen capture.
        Parameters:
        listener - A OnScreenCaptureListener to listen for the callback when screen capture is complete.
